articles.title: Taylor Swift looks horrified as her 'possessed' piano starts playing by itself - Daily Mail
articles.description: Taylor Swift's latest gig on her Eras tour took a spooky turn this week when her 'possessed' piano began playing by itself during a show.
articles.content:
A recent gig on Taylor Swift's Eras tour took a spooky turn this week when her 'possessed' piano began playing by itself during Sunday's show.
